location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a letter, dated 25 February 1811, from the Reverend Mr Arnold Burrows [Burrowes], Senior Chaplain of the Bombay Presidency, Bombay, to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay, regarding the Chaplain's dismissal of the town church clock mender. The enclosed letter includes its own enclosed letter, dated 1 February 1811, from General John Malcolm to the Chaplain, giving his approval of the dismissal.
